code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/carlkalonzo/Documents/DEV/johandemeij/johan-app/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import{ACTIONS}from'redux/actions/types.js';import{mainAction}from"redux/actions/index.actions";import{db}from"../../firebase";import _ from"lodash";var initialState={};export default function pageReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ACTIONS.LOAD_PAGE:{db.collection("pages").where('id','==',action.payload).get().then(function(snapshot){var data=snapshot.docs.map(function(doc){return doc.data();});action.asyncDispatch(mainAction(ACTIONS.LOAD_PAGE_SUCCESS,_objectSpread({},data)));});return state;}case ACTIONS.LOAD_PAGE_SUCCESS:{return action.payload[0];}case ACTIONS.LOAD_PAGES:{db.collection("pages").get().then(function(snapshot){var data=snapshot.docs.map(function(doc){return doc.data();});action.asyncDispatch(mainAction(ACTIONS.LOAD_PAGES_SUCCESS,_objectSpread({},data)));});return state;}case ACTIONS.LOAD_PAGES_SUCCESS:{return action.payload;}case ACTIONS.UPDATE_PAGE:{var _id='';db.collection("pages").where("id","==",action.payload.id).get().then(function(snapshot){var data=snapshot.docs.map(function(doc){_id=doc.id;return doc.data();});db.collection("pages").doc(_id).update(action.payload).then(function(){console.log("success");action.asyncDispatch(mainAction(ACTIONS.UPDATE_PAGE_SUCCESS,action.payload));});});}case ACTIONS.UPDATE_PAGE_SUCCESS:{return action.payload;}default:return _objectSpread({},state);}}
